value.excerpt: Power BI workspaces are not like old days, that we had Edit access and View access anymore. value.excerpt: Banding (or binning or grouping) is a scenario that can be implemented both statically and dynamically in Power BI. value.title: How to use AddColumns function in DAX and Power BI
